title: Bronze 1 Looking for a team / ranked duo
body:
Hey everyone, 

I'm looking for a team / duo ranked. i'm pretty chilled, don't rage and just layed back for the most part, though i do try to win haha. I just want to start playing ranked alot more with people who are chilled like my-self , so i can learn more about the game, considering im not so good haha. :) Thanks everyone :) (oh and i main adc/jg but im more than happy to play any role. )

replies.body:
Can i join im on alot im also a top/jg/mid laner i am a decent vayne player my in game name is tdawg101
im very chilled i dont get angry when i something bad happens
at the moment im smurfing an account jdawg101
